website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive child-sized set with style and design elements that help balance durability concerns.
pros: Child-sized set with snaps at the bottom in case your little mermaid has trouble swimming
Accented tankini top and adorable flower crown adds extra style to this set
cons: This set doesn't include a monofin or come in adult sizes
Not as durable as other options

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: So pretty, my 5 year old loves it and wore it out of the mail box even though it was 42 degrees here. She loves it!!! The headband of flowers doesnt match at all but she thinks it cool
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Happiest daughter EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to dress up. Yes, I know that this isn't a "costume", but she loves Mermaids and wanted something. After searching Amazon and looking at every. single. photo....she chose this product. She even starred at the order confirmation and pictures all day until the package arrived. This DID NOT disappoint. She absolute loves wearing this outfit...even in the bathtub...LOL
customer_reviews.author: cgwin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 yrs old and I usually have to get a bigger size because she is taller and weight build is that of a 5yr old and from the reviews I heard the size run big...so size 3T-4T was perfect! she loves it! I'm only rating a 4 because the mermaid tail ripped slightly by the zipper and I'm not sure if it was my fault or not...I didnt notice the zipper until I saw the small hole but it could've been because of how I let her jump right in it...once I sew it back, she will be the perfect little mermaid again 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was made with very poor material considering this is to be used in the water. My daughter has used it a total of 3 times since my purchase and as you can see it already has rips. The threads are not sewn in very well either. In addition the top had already come with a rip but she didn’t care and wanted to wear it right away. I gave it a 2 star because I thought it was at least cute.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves pretending she is a mermaid in this. It fits well but is made inexpensively. The cost is reflective of quality but still a great value for what I paid. My daughter has worn this everyday since she got it. I like that the tail opens at the bottom so that she can walk around.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Usai

customer_reviews.title: Best suit for your little mermaid!
customer_reviews.text: This bikini with scale print & mermaid tail along with floral headpiece is a little girl’s mermaid dream come true! My daughter (and I) love every piece! The top has back & neck ties so that she may not only enjoy it this summer, but probably next year too! Tail has room to put a mono fin (you’ll need to buy mono fin separately.) Fins down the best mermaid bikini & tail set under the sea!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very confusing .
customer_reviews.text: You say girls , then you say baby girls in the description. I’m a little frustrated ? Which is it ? I didn’t notice til you asked for a review. I’m giving it this week to my granddaughter. It’s either one of the other . Very misleading . I hope it’s for . a girl not a baby .
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This set is HUGE. Went by size chart but tail came all the way up under my granddaughter’s armpits, bottoms fell to her knees when wet, and top hung around neck like a homeless lady’s scarf. As far as quality goes, fabric is extremely thin, with unfinished edges. That being said, she still loved it and refused to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Akmmommy

customer_reviews.title: Although this runs very large, was still my nieces FAVE gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Way too large for my niece although I ordered her size. She LOVED it anyway and stopped opening her gifts to go put it on!!! She wore it the next day too!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Its adorable! Made pretty cheap but durable for a while! The bottoms go way high waisted. The top barely stays tied. Cute costume
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Breiler

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as my daughter's Halloween costume, but didn't like how small the top is (didn't seem kid-friendly). Was going to buy a nude-colored long-sleeve to put underneath, but wound up buying a different costume.
customer_reviews.author: Joi McClary

customer_reviews.title: Great mermaid costume
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this for her Halloween costume and loved it. She also has been able to continue to use it in the pool. It is nice that the tail snaps so if you need to get your feet out of it you can (for walking or even when swimming). Has held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: Keri R.

customer_reviews.title: Find something else
customer_reviews.text: The material is a cheap bathing suit fabric. The top doesn't fit properly. The top kept coming up my daughter's chest. She said it felt weird. The black kept untying. I can't return it cuz the kids wore it already. Dont buy, dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Arline H.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: All pieces came fair quality for the price. The colors are just like the advertised picture. It fit true to size for my daughter. The swimsuit can be swam in but not really the tail, but its good for drying off after a swim .I would buy more.

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because we thought the tail was going to be sturdy but it’s nothing but fabric that’s open at the end. The pictures are deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I washed it once and the hem on all three pieces came out. So bad that the top came out of the dryer balled up with white string. I had to cut it loose. My daughter wore it once and now doesn't stay up because waistband is falling out
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and exceeded my expectations. My granddaughter loved it and I'm ordering another one for another granddaughter lol
customer_reviews.author: SL Fackler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for little girls
customer_reviews.text: My neice loves it and I would highly recommend it for any little girl that loves to play dress up and loves mermaids
customer_reviews.author: kara kalender

customer_reviews.title: Adorable set
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smallest fit for my 3 year old...was perfect. Colors are bright, seems well made. Good for several uses. She loved the idea of being a mermaid. Cute set.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cute but material isn’t the greatest
customer_reviews.text: My three (almost four) daughter looooved it. She’s really into mermaids so the attached tail was perfect. However, I didn’t give it 5 stars because the material is pretty cheap. It will work for this summer and she’s happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid swimsuit set
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter (9) loves this set and cant wait to show it off at her birthday swim party next weekend. She picked it out from Amazon and it arrived as expected and is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: aadams3119

customer_reviews.title: Made a little girls wish come true!
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter absolutely LOVES it!! She is only 4 so only wears it in the bathtub for dress up but it did inspire her to learn how to swim without floaties this past summer! (Mermaids don't wear floaties!)🧜‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I was hesistant to buy it because of some reviews. It is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it!! She was so excited she said I made her dream come true. The swimming suit was everything it said it was
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. My daughter has loved having it.
customer_reviews.author: Agt954

customer_reviews.title: Flower band doesn’t match bathing suit!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a yellow/orange flower band that doesn’t match the blue mermaid bathing suit. Everything looks fine except the flower band. The picture shows a light blue flower band that matches the bathing suit. I wish I would’ve gotten that one. Other than that I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Missing top piece of swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't even come with the top of the swimsuit. Bought as a gift and missed deadline to get my money back. Daughter tried on what was in the package and it was VERY tight.
customer_reviews.author: mikegarcia

customer_reviews.title: Needs better buttons to secure the tail closure
customer_reviews.text: I love that my little girl enjoys this product. The only negative aspect is the buttons at the bottom of the tail came off the fabric REALLY easily. I will have to think of a way to keep the tail closed.
customer_reviews.author: BECKY

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a mermaid themed party and she was able to wear the tail for pictures and novelty. However it is heavy when wet and a child would be unable to swim in it. She still wears the headband with various outfits!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Just as described. Not much use for tail piece after excitement of getting it wears off.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as a gift for my granddaughters. I have not given them to them yet so cannot say anything about the fit. They are very cute and I think my girls will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ron White

customer_reviews.title: Every grandchild should have one!!!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it! There was a minor flaw in it but her mother was able to sew it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. Didn’t last even an hour!!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth $36. Had 2 holes in less than an hour first time she wrote it. Both holes in same place where the tail meets the body part.
customer_reviews.author: AMK

customer_reviews.title: Niece loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My niece really loved it. She wore it around and kept telling everyone she was a mermaid. She is 5 yrs old n it was a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Saniha

customer_reviews.title: Adorable mermaid swimsuit & tail
customer_reviews.text: Cute suit with mermaid tail. Very good quality fabric and drys quickly. Granddaughter looks adorable in it!
customer_reviews.author: DashDogs3

customer_reviews.title: Soooooo cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swimsuit for my friend's little girl who just couldn't wait to be a mermaid this summer. This is PERFECT for the price. The feet unbutton so she can walk around. And although it's a little long for the 5 year old, it's great to know she'll get a few summer's out of the tail!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product however it is slightly a little bit bigger expected. I order on the lower side of the scale and it was still big. Either way it was an amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: cat198

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute set but material is kind of cheaply made. Size was also too small and my daughter is petit for her age. Still very cute and my daughter was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Maveli quijada

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but missing the head piece and 3 small holes in the tail.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter absolutely loves this, but the head piece was never sent with the outfit and there are 3 small holes at the seam of the tail, she had only worn it once when I noticed the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tail.  Poor quality swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: The tail is of good quality. The swimsuit top is not sewn all the way around and of poor design and craft. The bottoms are disproportionately large in coverage but small in the waist. Overall, I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute suit and tail! I bought for my niece for her birthday so I’m not sure how it fits but it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse & Jaymie

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very very cute. It seems like it’s well made. Hopefully it will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The tail is just fabric can’t really swim without a fin
customer_reviews.text: I thought the bottom of the tail would be firm like a fin so it would be easier to swim in but it isn’t. It’s just fabric but my daughter still enjoyed it and we just bought a fin shaped fin and stuck it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Tiare

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is just a flimsy skirt with a tail shape at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it ☺️
customer_reviews.text: The article was the same as shown in the picture. Shipping was very fast. Will recommend. A+++.
customer_reviews.author: Lely

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP MADE
customer_reviews.text: ONLY HAD ONE WEEK AND IS COMING APART THEN HEM THE BOTTOM WOULD NOT EVER BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Colette Gayler

customer_reviews.title: It's AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this !! Fits so good my daughter is 5 I got the medium 5-6 she is in love!!! We can't wait to get to the beach :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Missing.
customer_reviews.text: The item is missing the bathing suit. I only received the mermaid tail and head band.
customer_reviews.author: courtney wimpee

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made!!
customer_reviews.text: The material is extremely cheap made. First time washed the jewel fell off and by the 3rd time wearing it swimming and washed the threads are now coming undone and all stretched out the top saggy and bottoms are stretched out as well. I would not recommend buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Missing an item in the four piece package
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 4 piece suit for my niece and didnt get the flower crown as advertised. I havent given it to her yet, so when I do I'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Celis

customer_reviews.title: If she wants to be like a mermaid, buy this ASAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 9 year old grand daughter...she really loves it and I would highly recommend buying this if you want to see a very excited recipient!
customer_reviews.author: brutaljewelz65

customer_reviews.title: For thin kids!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome. Very soft and comfortable. This fits a thin child.
customer_reviews.author: austinmama

customer_reviews.title: Great little suit for girls!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Suit was true to size for my slim 6 year old daughter. She loved it! Decent quality, especially for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Seams coming out
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter hasn't had it on more than 15 minutes and the seams are ripping open. It isn't too small. It's actually a little big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for my girl!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried at first but when my girl tried it on it was perfect! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Candice Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she loves it. Just wish the monofin would have been included even if cost a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute swinsuit set. My daughter adores it & it feels like it's made well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Dreese

customer_reviews.title: Quality Assurance
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Purchased as a gift for my niece and I can't wait for her to see it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not True to Size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large and it looks like a 4 year old could wear it. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda T Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Loving bath time
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love it, she even wear it during bath time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. My granddaughter is in love with this swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Fitzhugh

customer_reviews.title: tail too long
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old is in love with a mermaid suit but the tail part is just too long for her but other than that she can't stop wearing it
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Matias

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it! Not highest quality swimsuit ever purchased, but perfect for her to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the quality of the product. it got ripped or damage easily after a few times it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Dexton Omiter

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: So cute!!!!! My daughter fit in it perfectly and we love the cute sunflower headband as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ember Eastlake

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this to wear at her 4th birthday mermaid party. All of her friends loved it as well and wanted to wear the fun! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kmkb

customer_reviews.title: Should have suggested buying a fin before checkout
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know I was suppose to order a fin for the same price as the suit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: never buy again
customer_reviews.text: the tail is just cloth. there is nothing to but your feet in don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Takira Brown

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: The fit and quality were as expected when considering the price point. Overall satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted ❤️💯
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves it she has been wanting a mermaid 🧜‍♀️ with a tail on it for the longest..... she really loves it🥰
customer_reviews.author: Shaunysparkle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not happy bc didn't get everything we didn't get the swim suit bottom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like pictured and fits perfectly for my petite one. Shes in luv with it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great for young child
customer_reviews.text: I searched everywhere to find a small child’s mermaid tail! And this one was absolutely perfect. My three year old niece loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: 4 Pcs Baby Girls Swimsuits Mermaid for Swimming Halter Ruffled Tankini Top with Bottom Mermaid Cosplay Theme Party Favor
feature_bullets: 【Mermaid Set】 : 1 top , 1 pants underwear , 1 mermaid tail, 1 Garland(set of 4). The mermaid tail can add the monofin ( not included,needs to be purchased separately ). Every girl has mermaid princess dream,This is best birthday gifts and Christmas decoration, for little girls and toddler girls. looks like a real mermaid princess, make your little girl’ s mermaid dreams come true .

【Mermaid swimsuit Design】: Partial ruffles trimmings of leg openings, At the bottom of the mermaid tail can open and close with snaps, your kid can free walking and closing for fin. And support add extra monofin into tail skirt, swim Faster 60% than usual when use mermaid tail with Monofin, make your cute girl more flexible. Mermaid tail is designed to Be snug to follow the concept of real mermaid. Go and have funs in the swimming pool, enjoy the swimming new way.

【Applicable occasion】: Girls cute 4pcs Mermaid Tail costume, Good for the bathtub, kiddie pool, Kiddy Pool, Beach, Cosplay, Theme party, performance, xmas party, dress up, masquerade, beach holiday, pool party, swimming, Christmas role play, swim party, Children's photography, Beach party,birthday gift photo and purim ect.Best birthday gifts for little girls and baby girls who have a mermaid dream.

【Best Gift for girls】:Every Girl have a mermaid dream , Camlinbo mermaid tail swimsuit for swimming is the best holiday gift or Birthday for your child , Never worry about no idea about gift for your princess.

【Quality Materials】: Mermaid tails with the shiny fish scale texture design and Elastic Breathable Fabric, make the swimming suit looks like to be real mermaid fish scales, color does not fade or run, it is stretchable, elastic, flexible, and easy to be dry. In addition, it can resistant to the effects of the sun and pool chemicals. Mermaid bikini costume made of high elasticity fabric, make your cute little girl more flexible as a best charming mermaid princess.
